person.persName: Benedict Spalding, Jr. (Marion County, Ky, postmaster, clerk, and farmer)

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, clerk, farmer, and postmaster. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Ann Buckman Spalding. Father of Mary E. Spalding, Eulilia A. Spalding, Susan Spalding, Laurence Spalding, Joseph Spalding, and Sarah Benedict "Bonnie" Spalding. Postmaster at Raywick in Marion County, Kentucky, from December 22, 1845, to October 30, 1850. Farmer in Marion County, Kentucky, in 1850. Clerk in Raywick in 1860.
